metadata.title: RZ/V2M: Points to note when using ISP Support Package

sections.content:
Question:
I do not perform AI inference with the RZ/V2M, but I wish to use the ISP and Multimedia features. 
Is there anything I should note when doing so?
Answer:
Even if inference execution will not be performed, you should download the RZ/V2M DRP-AI Support Package and apply the patch.
ISP Support Package requires to apply the patch for DRP-AI Support Package, otherwise the patch applying for ISP Support Package is failed.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2M
